metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34676 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer handler, where an out-of-bounds read may lead to denial ofservice, information disclosure, or data tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
